screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping cart from Newegg for a Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse priced at $78.85. The cart includes options to adjust quantity, save the item for later, or remove it. There's a section for adding a protection plan, currently set to "None," and a promo code field. The total price is displayed at the bottom, with an option to proceed to secure checkout.
action_think: The shopping cart now contains the Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse, priced at $78.85. The next step is to proceed with the checkout as the user requested, which requires clicking the 'SECURE CHECKOUT' button at the bottom of the screen.
action_plan: Click on the 'SECURE CHECKOUT' button to proceed to the checkout page.
action_desc: Click on the 'SECURE CHECKOUT' button located at the bottom of the screen.
action_result:
By clicking on the "SECURE CHECKOUT" button, you have progressed toward completing the checkout process. The "SECURE CHECKOUT" action indicates that you are ready to proceed with the final steps of purchasing the items in your cart. However, this action does not directly address the user's request to empty the shopping cart or add the Logitech G Pro to the cart.

To fully complete the user's request, you will need to go back to the shopping cart, remove any existing items, search for the Logitech G Pro, and add it to the cart before continuing with the checkout process.
prev_action_result:
By clicking on the shopping cart icon, you have successfully navigated to the shopping cart page, where you can view the contents of your cart. The Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse is now in the cart, priced at $78.85, with the option to add a protection plan, which was shown in the previous screenshot.

This action brings you one step closer to completing the user request, as it shows the mouse is successfully added to the cart. The next steps would involve either removing any unwanted items (if present) and proceeding to checkout, which you can now do by pressing the "SECURE CHECKOUT" button. The cart appears ready for checkout, but the protection plan option has not been selected yet.

This action has made significant progress toward fulfilling the request, as you are now in the final step of purchasing the mouse.
